#summary Agile user stories for jscep

= Introduction =

See the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/User_story user story] article on Wikipedia for more information on user stories.

= Detail =

  * As a systems administrator, I want to add an entity to the PKI so that it can interact with other entities.
  * As a systems administrator, I want to renew an entity's certificate so that it can continue to interact with other entities.
  * As a systems administrator, I want to transition an entity from the old PKI to the new PKI so it can interact with other entities in the new PKI.

= Server Configurations =

  * CA
  * CA + 2 RAs (Entrust VPN Enrollment Server)
